sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Header, HeaderContent, HeaderTitle, LocationSection, LocationContainer, LocationLogoWrapper, LocationLogo, LocationContent, LocationTitle, LocationCopy, LocationLink, TimelineSection, TimelineContainer, TimelineLine, TimelineRow, TimelineLeftColumn, TimelineCenterColumn, TimelineRightColumn, TimelineTimeTitle, TimelineDot, TimelineDotIconWrapper, TimelineRowTitle, TimelineRowCopy, HotelSection, HotelContent, HotelColumnWrapper, HotelLeftColumn, HotelRightColumn, HotelTitle, HotelCopy, HotelOl, HotelLi, HotelLiLink, HotelOtherOptionsWrapper, HotelSubtitle, HotelOptionsList, HotelOptionsItem, } from './styledComponents' import { PageWrapper } from 'components' import { eventDetails } from 'config/images' import { FaHeart, FaHotel, FaBus, FaCocktail, FaMusic } from 'react-icons/fa' const timelineData = [ { time: 'TBD', title: 'Hotel Check-In', copy: 'Freshen up and get ready for the big day.', Icon: FaHotel, }, { time: 'TBD', title: 'Shuttle Pick-Up', copy: "Hop a bus ride so you don't have to drive.", Icon: FaBus, }, { time: 'TBD', title: 'Ceremony', copy: 'Make yourselves comfortable and join us for our special moment.', Icon: FaHeart, }, { time: 'TBD', title: 'Cocktail Hour', copy: 'Kick off the celebration and grab a drink.', Icon: FaCocktail, }, { time: 'TBD', title: 'Reception', copy: 'Join us for dinner, drinks, speeches, and dancing.', Icon: FaMusic, }, { time: 'TBD', title: 'Shuttle Return', copy: 'Easy way to make it back at the end of the night.', Icon: FaBus, }, ] export const EventDetails = () => { return (
Be our guest
Ceremony and Reception Please join us on Saturday, July 18th 2020 at DC Estate Winery 8877 State Line Rd, South Beloit, IL 61080. The Venue Directions {timelineData.map((row, index) => { const { time, title, copy, Icon } = row return ( {index % 2 === 0 && ( {time} )} {index % 2 === 1 && ( <> {time} {title} {copy} )} {index % 2 === 1 && ( {time} )} {index % 2 === 0 && ( <> {time} {title} {copy} )} ) })} Hotel Information We have secured a room block at the Hampton Inn Beloit (Hilton properties) for both Friday, July 17th and Saturday, July 18th. To make an online reservation, please go to{' '} www.hilton.com Enter "Beloit, WI, USA" in the destination input. Enter in the date of check-in (July 17th or 18th) Click "Special Rates" and enter the group code "TCW"{' '} Look for hotel selection with "Tate-Casarotto Wedding" at the Hampton Inn Beloit The agreed upon rate for the room block is $159.00, so please check that you have the correct price. If you call the Hampton Inn directly, please call{' '} (608) 362-6000{' '} and dial "0" to ensure you speak with someone at the front desk. When making your phone reservation, make sure to state the group code of "TCW" in order to receive the room block rates. The Cut-off date for joining the room block is 6/17/2020, so please book and plan accordingly. Note: There is a 48 hour cancellation policy. If the room block fills or if you wish to stay elsewhere, there are many hotel options to choose from close by. Other Hotel Options Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Beloit
2784 Milwaukee Rd, Beloit, WI 53511
(608) 365-2200 Quality Inn
2786 Milwaukee Rd, Beloit, WI 53511
(608) 362-2666 Super 8 by Wyndham Beloit
2790 Milwaukee Rd, Beloit, WI 53511
(608) 365-6000 Baymont by Wyndham Beloit
2900 Ford St, Beloit, WI 53511
(608) 365-8680 Holiday Inn Express & Suites Beloit
3022 Ford St, Beloit, WI 53511
(608) 519-4040 ) }
